stock up.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to buy a lot of something in order to keep it for when you need to use it later
stock up.translation[0].definitions[0].e: I have to stock up on snacks for the party.
stock up.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to buy a lot of something to use when you want to
stock up.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Wholesalers had been stocking up on juice before cash prices rose.
